panels.description: Returns count for jobs that still exist in Jenkins.
panels.title: Rolling Count

panels.description: Stage times for the LAST build of a Jenkins Job. We do not have per run metrics for this key.
panels.title: Build Stages - Last Build

targets.expr: (label_join(jenkins_builds_build_start_time_milliseconds{namespace="$namespace", repo="$repository", jenkins_job=~"$job", number=~"$build"}+0, "combined_label", ":", "jenkins_job", "number") >= $__from) and (label_join(jenkins_builds_build_start_time_milliseconds{namespace="$namespace", repo="$repository", jenkins_job=~"$job", number=~"$build"}+0, "combined_label", ":", "jenkins_job", "number") <= $__to) OR on() vector(0)
